Reference

Report templates and output

Rmarkdown templates, output formats and helpers

draft_redoc()

Create a Rmd doc for reversible reviewing using schola_redoc template

draft_word()

Create a Rmd doc using schola_word template

schola_word()

Basic Schola Empirica word document

Making charts

Tools for making charts in ggplot2

flush_axis

A shorcut for making axis text flush with axis

theme_schola()

A Schola Empirica ggplot2 theme

Font helpers and shortcuts

Tools for installing, setting and using fonts contained in reschola

font_rc font_rc_bold font_rc_thin font_rc_light font_r_bold font_r_thin font_r font_r_light

Roboto font shortcuts

import_fonts()

Import fonts needed for theme_schola defaults

import_roboto()

Import Roboto font for use in charts

set_reschola_ggplot_fonts()

Mqke ggplot2 use chosen font in geom_text/label
